title: Reactions to Panthers hiring Matt Rhule & Giants hiring Joe Judge
itunes:title: Reactions to Panthers hiring Matt Rhule & Giants hiring Joe Judge
description:
DJ and Bucky are back with a new episode. To start off the show, the guys talk about the Browns request to interview Eagles defensive coordinator Jim Schwartz for their head coaching vacancy (1:09). After that, DJ and Bucky discuss what the Detroit Lions could do with the third-overall pick in the 2020 NFL Draft (5:52). Next, the duo reacts to the news of the Panthers hiring Baylor's Matt Rhule to be their head coach (10:51) and the news of the Giants hiring Patriots special teams coordinator and wide receivers coach Joe Judge to be their head coach (20:27). To wrap up, the pair evaluate the top three college quarterback prospects in the 2020 class (28:34).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
